alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:45AM AKST until January 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Areas of blowing snow. Snow accumulations of 12 inches. * WHERE...Denali south of McKinley Village. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will occur south of McKinley Village. North of McKinley Village snow amounts will be 3 to 6 inches. Windy conditions with blowing and drifting snow will occur North of McKinley Village.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
